cab.content: This document is the property oil His Britannic Majesty s Government0149 ' 7985WAR CABINET.AREA AND POPULATION OP THE PROVINCES OP SOUTH RUSSIA OCCUPIED BY GENERAL DENIKIN'S ARMY.MEMORANDUM BY THE SECRETARY OF STATE FOR WAR.The following information will be of interest to my colleagues.WINSTON S.
